statements: UPDATE PlayerInteractions SET interaction_type='like', interaction_timestamp='2022-01-15 08:00:00', interaction_details='Liked the post' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE PlayerInteractions SET player_id=5, interaction_timestamp='2022-01-20 12:30:00', interaction_type='comment', interaction_details='Left a comment' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE PlayerInteractions SET interaction_timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:30:00', interaction_details = 'Updated interaction details' WHERE id = 100 AND player_id = 500
UPDATE PlayerInteractions SET interaction_type = 'like', interaction_details = 'Added a like', interaction_timestamp = '2022-01-20 14:45:00' WHERE player_id = 600 AND id = 200
UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_type='login', timestamp=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE player_id='player1';
UPDATE chat_logs SET message_text='Hello, how are you?', timestamp=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE player_id='player2' AND message_id='12345';
UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_type = 'login' WHERE player_id = '12345'
UPDATE chat_logs SET message_text = 'Hello, how are you?' WHERE player_id = '67890'
UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_details = 'Updated interaction details' WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE chat_logs SET message = 'Hello, this is an updated message' WHERE user_id = '1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7a8b-9c0d-1e2a3b4c5d6e';
UPDATE player_interactions SET timestamp = '2022-08-15 10:30:00', interaction_type = 'login' WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE chat_logs SET message = 'Hello, how are you?', user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' WHERE timestamp > '2022-08-10 14:00:00';
UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_type = 'comment' WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE chat_logs SET message_text = 'Hello, how are you?' WHERE sender_id = 54321;
UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_type = 'like' WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE chat_logs SET message_text='Hello, how are you?' WHERE sender_id = 456;
UPDATE players SET player_level = 10 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE chat_logs SET message = 'Updated message' WHERE log_id = 5;
UPDATE players SET player_level = player_level + 1 WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'Achievement Unlocked' WHERE player_id = 54321;
